name: Wisp: Light the Way
description:
Wisp: Light the Way is an endless physics-based action/puzzle game in which you control a wisp, and must fling yourself between light sources to move onward. The further you get, the more points you earn - use them to buy new wisp colours!

  • Drag and release to fling the wisp from light to light - but aim carefully, or you might hit the ground and burn out!
  • Progress through varied environments, and see how far you can get!
  • Try and beat your high score!
  • Earn points based on your distance that you can spend of new wisp colours!

(Originally released around March 2020, but uploaded here for completeness)
